resources.string: It will be displayed the kunyomi(japanese origin) and onyomi(chinese origin) of each kanji with its respective meaning. Click Next.

In this page you can read some stories to practice your reading abilities. If you press the story above you will get the full translations of the stories. \n ⚠ Rotate the phone for better reading experience.
Here you can find correct transcripts from youtube videos which are spoken in japanese. Now, whenever you misunderstood something during your listening practice, you can check here.

Question 1 

 医者(isha):doctor 
 病気(byōki):sick 
 前(mae):before 
 質問(shitsumon):question 
 行く(iku):go 
 部屋(heya):room 
 答えてください(kotaete kudasai):please answer 
 呼びます(yobimasu):call

Question 2 

 コート(kooto):coat 
 どれ(dore):which 
 先に(saki ni):first,earlier 
 帰る(kaeru):return,go home 
 白い(shiroi):white 
 長い(nagai):long 
 ポケット(poketto):pocket

Question 3 

 お姉さん(oneesan):elder sister 
 人(hito):person 
 あそこ(asoko):there 
 欠けている(kakete iru):lacking,missing 
 履く(haku):to wear lower-body clothing 
 眼鏡(megane):glasses

Question 4 

 美術館(bijutsukan):museum 
 人(hito):person 
 切符(kippu):ticket 
 ずつ並んで(side by side):lacking,missing 
 並びます(narabimasu):line up 
 入り口(iriguchi):entrance 
 方へ進んで(kata he susunde):proceed towards

Question 5 

 見学会(kengaku kai):tour 
 出発します(shuppatsu shimasu):will depart 
 財布(saifu):wallet 
 お昼(ohiru):lunch 
 集まって(atsumatte):gather 
 必要(hitsuyo):required,necessary 
 記録(kiroku):record 
 一つずつ(hitotsuzutsu):one by one 
 持ってきて(motte kite):bring 
 用意します(yoishimasu):prepare 
 傘(kasa):umbrella
⚠ The correction of the option you selected is on the key words page.
Here you can do multiple choice questions to test your listening comprehension.In case you have difficulties with a word, you can see the key words of each audio by click on the underlined text.
